kalamanakaruwekuge ek kusalathawayak wanne minisun wenas kirima ya.
dennata denna gana awabodhayak labenawa.
thawa tika durak yana wita hitha hithala
anthimata hoyagaththu widiyata thibila thiyenne mokakda dannawada?
esekalhi, ‘numbaawahanse kshadamakaragaththehi nam ekala mama kshmawuyemnam wemi’yi uththarawa wisin kiyanaladdemi.
atalo dahama mewani hethupala dahama ka්riyathmaka wana ka්riyawaliyaki.
wiwara karamin wachana uchcharanaya karayi.
kotte senawath prthikal senawath kotten pitathwa yuddhayata yana wita widiye raja atulugama 5 indagatha nohi kalugangin etharawa gosin pasyodun koralaya mada unnaha.
me uthum dharmaya thama wisinma, thama thulinma dakagathayuthu dharmayak.
mama upanthekata siripade nagala nathuwa .
mata therune naththe "magema chu deka" kiyanne mokak da kiyala..
aththatama mama siwil injineru thakshana niladhariyek widihata wadakaraddi mage yatathe wadakarapu sulusewakayan mata wada watupak gaththa
thiyunu sangnyaාwak yuddhaya nisa thama idam ahimiwu wasiyange idam himikama labadima pashchath yuda samaye jana jiwitha godanangima palamu piyawara we.
eeta amatharawa magema wyaparayak karannath, wiwaha wennath balaporoththu wenawa.
eya itha sundara mayawi dawasak wiya.
namuth, dan ohuta dangediyen nangita ya hakiya.
lawrow brithanya agamathi theresa me wiwechanaya karamin pawasuwe age aanduwa, “siyallanta rusiyanu wirodhi mawatha ganna lesa balakarana” bawayi.
ee nisa apata ammage miniya bhara ganna baha.”
mage wayasa saha gahaniyek wima nisa apiwa mattu karanna puluwan kiyala samaharu hithanawa athi.
mei wage kakkadinta thadi bala elawanna ona thawath kendara balanna bari wena widiyata
ee gana ma kanagatu wanne naha.
karapu kament walata wadak demu...
yana panaya eyin pana nangi.
mema kandayame boho parinatha kridakayek nomathi wuwath mema siyaluma kridakayinta pahe ithamathma hoda athdakim athi bawa mema kandayama adhyayanaya kirimedi obata peni yanu atha.
ese hamu wana thek obata samu dennam sadadara guru piyanane…

idiri sathi deka athulathadi adala gasat niwedanaya ahosi kirimata baladharin piyawara noganne nam akhandawa mita wada dadi wruththiya samithi kriyamargayakata yamata eeye (05 da) raswu waidya niladharinge sangamaye widhayaka kamituwa thiranaya kala bawada waidya marasinha thawaduratath "diwayina"ta pawasiya.
ela wadak aa...
mama apiwa sathutin piligaththa .
thaththa thamayi ban minihekuta baya nathuwa waliyak daganna puluwan ekama manussaya . . . .
kohoma unath ohuge nama kshethrayen makala danna nam bariweyi.
thiranaya obata barayi...
eeth bhawana karanne nathuwa nam inna baha.
pasu kaleka ladi ranasinhayan "kopi kade", "maraka ranga", "siwdigin sath muhudin", "ati kukula kukulekda" wani janapriya natya malawakda nishpadanaya kota pracharaya kaleya.
bawas gadn math gihin thiyenewa.hari sundara thanak neda?
bhuthathmayak daknata nowiya.
meyata hethuwa tiyushanda?

me wasara muladi widesha ratawala sitina koti kriyakarin punaruththapanaya nowu hitapu koti thrasthawadin yodawa demala jathika sandhanaye manthriwarayaku ghathanaya kirimak helikaraganimata polisiyata hakiwiya.me sambandhayen kihipa denekuma athadanguwata ganimata haki wu athara ee sadaha bhawitha kirimata niyamithawa thibu klemo bomba dekakda soyaganna ladi.
aththenma thoti meka parana post ekak.
ow hodayi machan.

diwa bhojanayen pasu, shri lanka ithihasaye prabalathama yuddhayen jayaganime niyamuwa wu, me abhitha, edithara, abhimanawath maha senewiyata dirghayusha prarthanaya kota samu di, apith gamarata bala pitathwuna.
api samupakara kaduwata gaththe hal miti 2-3, sini, dhanya wargayak wage dewal witharayi.
aakase innawa wage dane­nawa.
api samanthara lokayaka thawath tharangayak gena eyi.
"mama apata labadi thibu sangarawa balamin hitiya.
ganunta kata thibune nathnam umbaala wage minissu me loke inna ganunwa kochchara thala pela pagagena indiyida?
mata methana thaniyema nanna ba" "hari wadakne...mata ba methana inna" "ane ane...mama nanne na.
siyallea්ma guruthumiya desa neth yeama baluha.
ehema yoda gaththama me rate minissu aluthen badu wikunanawa thiya wikinena baduwath ganida?

katholika kristhiyani palli wala muslim lebbela hindu pujakawaru karana mewani aparadha nithiya idiriyata paminenne natha ..eewa sadahatama ma walali atha ,, bauddhayanta awaman kirimata siwuru porawagath anya aagamikayin karana mewani aparadha walin apahasuthawayata path wanne ape garuthara sanghayawahanselayi ….
yanadiya mema arbudayata itha wadagath aakarayen dayakathwaya sapayu eewa we. 1990 ganan wana witath a.e.ja.ye niwasa himikama pawathiye 64% tharam pahath anupathikayakaya.
siyalu denata ma wawagena aahara bhukthi windime awakashayak natha.

polonnaruwa nagaraya da nawina pahasukamwalin yukthawa sanwardhanaya kere.moragahakanda - kaluganga wyapruthiya mangin mathale pradeshaye sita rajaratata laba dena jalaya nisa uthurumada pradeshaye pawathina wakugadu rogaya walakwimata da pitubalayak labenu atha.eeta amatharawa me wyapruthiya yatathe aluth waw 51 k ha palam 80 k idiwe.
habayi shri lanka krikat kiyanne mage angenma ena deyak kiyala dan eyala dannawa.
